channel.title: Pages on Luis G. Villegas
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Luis G. Villegas

item.title: About
item.description: This is my portfolio, where you will find a lot of content related to Strapi, the best headless CMS out there. Here you will find tutorials on how to install & use my plugins, both in the Strapi application and the frontend through their API. Follow @luisguve

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can reach me out at my email: luisguveal@gmail.com
